lines.text: There's one thing about a blind date. It sure opens your eyes.

[walking home from a date]
I'll admit it's kind of tough on the feet, but see what it does for the girlish figure.
Oh honey, that girlish figure of yours certainly gets you into a lot of marathon walks.
Just another one of those fellows that like to dictate with their hands.
I had three dates and broke two of 'em - and then the big ape telephones that his wife is in town and he couldn't get away.
To him love's just a cafeteria, only you got stuck with the cheque.
